name: Sensible World Of Soccer 21 AGA PC
name_original: Sensible World Of Soccer 21 AGA PC
description:
Combined a 2D football game with a comprehensive manager mode. The game includes contemporary season data of professional football from around the world, with a total amount of approximately 1,500 teams and 27,000 players. all fully updated to Dec 16th 2020 Kondogbia to Atletico Madrid Morata to Juventus Havertz Werner to Chelsea and over 800 Player transfers done professionally and RNC packed teams so no season crash correct kits for season 21 home and away and all relegations and promotions done a very time consuming project brought back for the millions of fans worldwide.

Selectable stadiums from 3d effect to original 2d

Added china super league

Inter Miami added and FC cincinati

Works on windows XP ,7,8.1 10 32bit and 64bit

we have been making new swos updates since 2013 selling on various platforms like amazon ebay bonanza fully technical support just message me on twitter

game has inbuilt Amiga Winuae emulator and orignal 16 colour pitches upgraded gfx

follow me on twitter

https://twitter.com/PaulBarrass9
